ubOperating: UB Market LTD has been actively operating and dynamically developing in the export and import market of food products since 2020, ensuring supplies to European countries. Our top priority is providing mass consumption products from reliable and quality manufacturers.
weGarantee: We guarantee our customers the highest quality products, a wide range, and first-class service from a team of professionals. UB Market LTD works with well-known brands and trusted suppliers, serving both retail customers and local and national networks.
collaboration: Ukrainian-Bulgarian export-import company UB Market LTD, we invite you to collaborate!
exploreProducts: Explore our range of high-quality products
